product_name: Softride Dura Assist 4 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: The built-in hydraulic mechanism of the Softride Dura Assist 4 Bike Hitch rack helps you raise and lower the bike mast easily so you can spend your energy on the ride rather than on loading the bikes.
short_description: The built-in hydraulic mechanism of the Softride Dura Assist 4 Bike Hitch rack helps you raise and lower the bike mast easily so you can spend your energy on the ride rather than on loading the bikes.
